replies.body: I feel you man. I used to suck at pvp, but guess what? Avicus is the perfect environment for people of all levels. Especially beginners of pvp. Just practice on nexus to train you pvp skills. (that's really how i got better). If you like sniping or bowing, ask me for free tutorials :D. Hope to see you on!
replies.body_tagged: I feel you man. I used to suck at pvp, but guess what? Avicus is the perfect environment for people of all levels. Especially beginners of pvp. Just practice on nexus to train you pvp skills. (that's really how i got better). If you like sniping or bowing, ask me for free tutorials :D. Hope to see you on!

replies.body: Welcome to the community! I hope you have a great stay! I will be adding you over skype, if you have any questions feel free to write to me on skype or contact other members of the staff team! (You can find their skype on their profile if they have written it down there, like me)
